year2Ques.question: We can do all these things with the computer EXCEPT
___is known as the brain box of the computer
Which of these is a way of caring for the computer
options: keep it in a hot room
if it stops working, call a computer engineer
year2Ques.answer: if it stops working, call a computer engineer

year2Ques.question: The ____is an output device, it is an electronic device that looks like a television
__is flat and has the shape of a rectangle
What part of the computer is used for pointing and selecting objects on the computer?
What device makes noise while typing?
The part of a computer system that prints work on paper is called
In computing, UPS means
In computing, the trash also has other names like __&__
__is a machine which quickly copies documents onto papers by photographing them
Which of these is not a part of an extension box
____is the action performed by an air conditioner
___invented the air conditioner
An electronic device that accepts data, processes data and brings it out as information is called
One of these is not an ICT device
We can care for ICT devices by
options: avoid placing heavy objects on top of computers and other devices
washing them with soap and water
year2Ques.answer: avoid placing heavy objects on top of computers and other devices

year2Ques.question: Which of the following is a part of a smartphone?
